scripts.lib:build: mkdir -p tracking-library/build && uglifyjs tracking-library/src/loader.js -cm -o tracking-library/build/loader.min.js && uglifyjs tracking-library/src/taevents.js -cm -o tracking-library/build/taevents.min.js
scripts.extension:build: mkdir -p chrome-extension/build && uglifyjs chrome-extension/src/background/*.js -b -o chrome-extension/build/background.min.js && uglifyjs chrome-extension/src/popup/*.js -cm -o chrome-extension/build/popup.min.js
scripts.build: npm run lib:build && npm run extension:build
